P

pl.polsl.controller - package pl.polsl.controller
The controller package contains class Controller The controller processes user commands, updates the model, and refreshes the view.

The main package contains the entry point of the application.

The model package contains classes representing the application's data and logic.
pl.polsl.view - package pl.polsl.view
The view package contain class View The View class is responsible for user interface and output.s
